definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The frescos in the Sistine Chapel are world-famous.
sentences.chinese: 西斯廷教堂的壁画举世闻名。

sentences.english: It's just these heart-thrilling chapters that brought his work world renown.
sentences.chinese: 正因这些扣人心弦的篇章才使得他的作品举世闻名。

sentences.english: Xi'an is a world-famous city for her ancient culture.
sentences.chinese: 西安是一座举世闻名的文化古城。
重庆火锅也是举世闻名的。

sentences.english: The world-famous Stone Forest lies within Lunan County.
sentences.chinese: 举世闻名的石林胜景位于路南县境内。

sentences.english: Junction which is located in France and Switzerland, the world-famous Lake Geneva Region.
sentences.chinese: 其中位于法国与瑞士交接处的举世闻名的日内瓦湖区。

sentences.english: Carefully selected culture venues such as world famous landmarks and tourist interests.
sentences.chinese: 精选文化场所，诸如举世闻名地标和旅游景点。

sentences.english: French cuisine is famous around the world.
"the ball king" Belli "the crow mouth" it may be said world famous.
sentences.chinese: “球王”贝利的“乌鸦嘴”可谓举世闻名。

sentences.english: Behind them lies an 18-km long coconut landscaping belt. It is famous both at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 花的那边就是举世闻名的长达18公里的椰梦长廊。

sentences.english: Yarlung Zangbo rift is a suture line between the colliding plates.
sentences.chinese: 雅鲁藏布江断裂是举世闻名的缝合线。

sentences.english: This world-famous destination is a Mecca for anyone who loves to surf.
sentences.chinese: 这个举世闻名的旅游目的地是喜爱冲浪的人们的麦加。

sentences.english: And just acro the street will be the world - renowned Rockefeller Center.
sentences.chinese: 对面大街就是举世闻名的洛克斐勒中心。

sentences.english: Da Long Pool is well known in the world and is the most beautiful one in Yan Dang Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大龙湫瀑布举世闻名，是雁荡山泉瀑流水之最。

sentences.english: After all, this is a world famous Champs-Elysees ah.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟这是举世闻名的香榭丽舍大街啊。

sentences.english: Yinxu is well know for bronzes, jades, and inscribed oracle bones unearthed from the site.
sentences.chinese: 遗址出土的青铜器，玉器，甲骨卜辞举世闻名。

definition: to be famous far and wide (idiom)
seasoned/honed to perfection over centuries/special reserve
to make a name/to become famous
